meanings.definition: In a way that defies natural laws or logic.
meanings.sent1: The cat miraculously jumped from the roof to the ground.
meanings.sent2: She miraculously found her lost ring in the sand.
meanings.sent3: The cookie jar was miraculously empty after the party.
meanings.sent4: The old car miraculously roared back to life after years of neglect.
meanings.sent5: The seeds planted yesterday had miraculously grown into tall sunflowers today.

meanings.definition: In a way that is extremely fortunate or unexpected.
meanings.sent1: He miraculously won the lottery on his first try.
meanings.sent2: The sun miraculously appeared after days of rain.
meanings.sent3: The ice cream cone miraculously landed on his head.
meanings.sent4: Her voice miraculously reached the back of the auditorium without a microphone.
meanings.sent5: The lost keys miraculously turned up in the refrigerator.
